radiographic_examinations.findings: Thoracic vertebra bent slightly to the right.
Epiphyseal of the distal ulna appeared and the epiphyseal and distal radius were not closed; wrist bones with 13-year-old bone age.

Abdominal occupation due to left adrenal area and prerenal space tumors. Bilateral abnormal adrenal enhancement of nodules and mass shadow, internal fat density shadow and uneven enhancement scan, with the right size of about 17 × 12mm and the left size of about 98 × 83mm.
Pituitary form is slightly full and the height was about 0.9 cm.
